dafi (executable)¶

DAFI main executable.

Parses the input file and runs dafi.run(). Saves the DAFI version (Git commit hash) and the run time to hidden files (‘.dafi_ver’ and ‘.time’, respectively).

Example

>>> dafi <input_file>
Input File

The input file is written using yaml syntax. The input file contains the following three dictionaries:

  • dafi (required) - see dafi.main.run() for inputs.

  • inverse - see inputs in chosen inverse method in dafi.inverse. This corresponds to the ‘inputs_inverse’ input to dafi.main.run().

  • model - inputs as required by user-provided physics model. This corresponds to the ‘inputs_model’ input to dafi.main.run().
